DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of this registry study is to observe the use of single dose and multi-dose use of eptacog alpha (NovoSeven®) and to compare short-term outcomes, including effectiveness, safety, quality of life and treatment satisfaction with the approved treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study of NovoSeven® Used as On-demand Treatment of Bleeds in Patients With Haemophilia A and B With Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Treated with eptacog alpha (NovoSeven®) Investigator decision to measure for antibody as unnecessary medical testing
